message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $140. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your offer.  I'm happy to come down a little, but $135 is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about $132.50?
